QuestData.Title: Closing the Door
QuestData.Description: The Shadowmoon orcs are using portals to bring in reinforcements and smuggle away draenei captives.$B$BIf we are to have any hope of retaking the village, we must destroy the portals at once.$B$BThe only way to do this is to kill the portalmasters who keep the rifts open.
QuestData.LogDescription: Close 3 Void Portals by killing Shadowmoon Portalmasters.
QuestData.RewardText: Wonderful. That should slow down the attack.$B$BOur forces should be able to retake the forest quickly.
